title: FSAE HV Tractive Battery System
summary: Researched, designed, and fabricated a high‑voltage tractive battery; −8% mass, −70% wiring complexity, −15% losses.
description: Led energy storage design and documentation for Aztec Electric Racing. Integrated safety, monitoring, and serviceability; standardized validation procedures.

title: Unsteady Aerodynamics Research
summary: Analyzed aeroelastic and unsteady effects; contributed to LaTeX-authored papers under Dr. Luciano Demasi.
description: Combined computational and experimental methods to study unsteady aerodynamics and wing structures. Managed data, formatting, and documentation.

title: IAM3D Drone Competition
summary: ASME SDSU project manager; team placed 4th internationally.
description: Coordinated procurement, budget, design docs, and travel logistics; led meetings and project tracking.
